name: Video Localization by Algebras
tagline: Culturally accurate dubbing that feels human (32 languages)
description: Algebras brings human-level precision to AI dubbing. Our system keeps lip-sync, rhythm, and emotion intact while adapting language and tone for each culture. Studios and creators use it to launch videos globally — without losing intent or timing. Behind the scenes, our API scales the same dubbing engine across thousands of videos, but what you hear first is accuracy, not automation.

name: Logo.dev
tagline: Reliable logos for any product, instantly.
description: Logo.dev provides reliable brand logos for any company, stock ticker, or crypto symbol. Use it in dashboards, SaaS products, fintech apps, and internal tools. Fast global CDN performance, simple API calls, and smart fallback logos so your UI always looks at it's best.

name: Superapp
tagline: Build native iOS apps with AI & Swift
description: The first AI full-stack engineer for iOS. Codes in Swift, designs with Apple standards, and connects your Supabase automatically. Works with both Swift and React Native Expo.

name: YouWare Mobile
tagline: A Vibe Coding Engineer in Your Pocket
description: Build using natural-language prompts or your voice. With YouWare, AI coding feels like a conversation. No complex setup. No coding experience required. We call it Vibe Coding - describe your project, and YouWare brings it to life.

name: TRAE SOLO
tagline: The Responsive Coding Agent
description: In this update, TRAE SOLO receives its most significant upgrade yet — introducing the all-new SOLO Coder, built to handle complex, challenging development tasks. Powered by the #1 SWE-Bench code agent, SOLO delivers a visual, plan-first, multi-agent workflow that brings a brand-new level of development experience and efficiency — responsive, transparent, and truly parallel.

name: Webflow App Gen
tagline: Build full-stack web apps natively in Webflow with AI
description: Build production-grade, full-stack web apps with AI that incorporate your design system, components, and CMS collections to match your site’s brand, content, and creative vision.

name: Signal Watcher
tagline: Monitor people, companies, and the signals that matter
description: The only tool that monitors 350+ B2B datapoints and alerts you in real-time for you to take action.

name: cto.new
tagline: Completely free AI code agent
description: Code with the latest frontier models from Anthropic, OpenAI and more. No credit card or API keys required. Instant access only for Product Hunt - https://cto.new/product-hunt

name: Hyperlink by Nexa AI
tagline: On-device AI super assistant for your files
description: Hyperlink is like Perplexity for your local files. It turns your computer into an AI second brain — 100% private and local. It understands every document, note, and images on your computer — letting you ask in natural language and get cited answers instantly. It has a consumer-grade UI to let you interact with local AI easily with zero setup.

name: Fuser
tagline: Your creative workspace for every AI model and every medium
description: Creative professionals use Fuser to design AI-powered workflows across any medium all on a single canvas. Watch your tools work together and your ideas evolve into something new. Where creative flow meets creative control. Try Fuser Now.

name: Hathora
tagline: Explore, test & deploy production ready voice models.
description: Build voice agents on open source or closed models with zero DevOps. Start instantly on shared endpoints and upgrade to dedicated infrastructure for privacy, compliance, or VPC requirements. Models run in 14 regions for ultra low latency. Bring your own models or custom containers as you scale.

name: Brainfish
tagline: Real-time product knowledge for every agent
description: Knowledge Discovery continuously compares product reality to your docs, proposes ready‑to‑ship edits, and pushes approved context into every agent. Fewer wrong answers. Faster enablement.

name: Kadabra
tagline: Automate your work in minutes with AI
description: Meet Kadabra, the agent that kills boring tasks. You describe the outcome in plain text, Kadabra designs the workflow > tests it > runs it on schedule or by trigger. It plugs into Slack, Notion, Sheets, Gmail, webhooks, and more. See every step, approve with one click, and keep guardrails on. Ship real automations in minutes, not months. For growth, ops, marketing, sales and product teams that want more output without more headcount.

name: Crono 2.0
tagline: The first AI GTM Platform for B2B Sales Teams
description: Crono 2.0 redefines go-to-market execution by introducing an AI-native layer built directly into our proven Crono 1.0 platform. Used by 200+ startups and SMBs across Europe, it now empowers teams to interact seamlessly with an intelligent AI layer that manages and optimizes every GTM motion.

name: Waldium
tagline: The autonomous blog that writes while you build product
description: Wake up to fresh content already published. Get cited when people ask ChatGPT for recommendations. Your sales team finally has content for every feature. Competitors wonder how you publish so consistently. Content drives measurable signups and adoption. You're building in public without thinking about it. Set it once. Content runs itself. Results compound. Waldium is autonomous publishing infrastructure. AI generation, beautiful hosting, analytics, automation.

name: Scribe v2 Realtime
tagline: The most accurate real-time Speech to Text model.
description: Built for voice agents, meeting notetakers, and live applications, it transcribes in 150ms across 90+ languages, including English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Hindi, and Japanese.

name: Cotera
tagline: The best agentic AI builder
description: Cotera launched the ability to self-serve -- sign up on your own, build your own agents, connect tools and go. - build agents via chat - hundreds of tools - transparency & control

name: AI Feedback by Amplitude
tagline: Understand what users want with AI (formerly Kraftful)
description: Customer conversations are happening everywhere: on X, Reddit, Discord, app reviews, support tickets, and more, and keeping up is nearly impossible. AI Feedback from Amplitude brings all of that feedback together in one place, digests it, and highlights what truly matters. It helps product teams move faster, prioritize the right problems, spot emerging trends, and build features customers actually want based on what they say and what they do.

name: Rally Tax
tagline: AI co-pilot for year-round proactive tax strategy
description: In the AI era, you don’t need a $5,000 advisor to discover savings.

name: Cranston AI
tagline: AI-powered accounting, built like a product company.
description: Cranston is a full-stack AI accounting firm. We replace traditional accounting labor with autonomous AI systems, supervised by licensed CPAs. Most tools in this space either sell software to accountants or layer chatbots on top of spreadsheets. We built the accounting firm itself — end to end — so we can automate the work directly and guarantee accuracy.

tagline: Culturally accurate dubbing that feels human (32 languages)
